summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ReWear POS app with NEW RELEVANCE FEATURES. All new features working correctly: 4-step purchase flow (Level → Condition → Relevance → Price), price matrix system with Excel download/upload, and relevance display in history/receipts.
passed_tests: Backend API all endpoints (12/12 tests passed)
Backend categories endpoint includes relevance_levels
Backend price matrix lookup functionality
Backend price matrix download (Excel with 816 combinations)
Backend price matrix get/clear operations
Backend purchase creation with relevance field
Backend purchase retrieval with relevance data
Frontend main page with 'Preise' button for settings
Frontend category selection opens 4-step dialog
Frontend Step 1: Price Level selection (Luxus/Teuer/Mittel/Günstig)
Frontend Step 2: Condition selection (Neu/Kaum benutzt/Gebraucht/Abgenutzt)
Frontend Step 3: NEW RELEVANCE selection (Stark relevant/Wichtig/Nicht beliebt)
Frontend Step 4: Price entry with fixed price checking
Frontend cart shows relevance in item details
Frontend complete purchase flow with relevance
Frontend settings page (/settings) loads correctly
Frontend Excel download button works
Frontend Excel upload accepts .xlsx files
Frontend history page shows relevance in item details
Frontend receipt page shows relevance in item details
Frontend navigation between all pages works
